description:
Google Gemini app is your personal, proactive and powerful AI assistant.

With Gemini on your iPhone or iPad, you can:

– Go Live with Gemini to brainstorm ideas, simplify complex topics and rehearse for important moments. Share your camera or screen in Gemini Live conversations to talk with Gemini about anything that you see. Just click on the Gemini Live button in your Gemini app
– Bring your ideas to life with Canvas. From prompt to prototype, create apps, games, web pages, infographics, Audio Overviews and more
– Connect with your favourite Google apps, like Search, YouTube, Google Maps, Gmail and more
– Study smarter and explore any topic with quiz and flashcard creation, interactive visuals and real-world examples
– Turn any file into a podcast that you can listen to any time, anywhere
– Create and edit stunning images from just a few words
– Plan trips better and faster
– Get summaries, deep dives and source links, all in one place
– Brainstorm new ideas or improve existing ones

Try Nano Banana: State-of-the-art image generation and editing built on Gemini 2.5 Flash


Level up your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Plus plan – unlock new and powerful features to boost your creativity and productivity:
– Get more access to our most powerful models, like 2.5 Pro
– Generate and dive into detailed reports on any topic with Deep Research powered by 2.5 Pro
– Turn words into high-quality, eight-second video clips with video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast and more.

Google AI Plus includes additional benefits. Gemini app, as part of Google AI Plus, will be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get even more out of your Gemini app experience by upgrading to the Pro plan, which helps you tackle complex tasks and projects. Enjoy an industry-leading 1M token context window (enabling Gemini to process up to 1,500 pages of text or 30k lines of code), and higher access to our most capable model 2.5 Pro, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and video generation with Veo 3.1 Fast.

Gemini in Google AI Pro includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Pro subscription. The Gemini app, as part of Google AI Pro, will continue to be available to qualifying Google Workspace business and education plans. Learn more: https://gemini.google/subscriptions/

Get the best of Gemini app by upgrading to the Ultra plan – unlock the highest level of access to the best of Google AI and exclusive features. Get the highest access to Google's most powerful model, like 2.5 Pro, features like video generation with Veo 3.1, Deep Research on 2.5 Pro and unlock Gemini 2.5 Deep Think. You'll also get early access to try our newest AI innovations as they become available, including Agent Mode.

Gemini in Google AI Ultra includes additional benefits as part of a Google AI Ultra subscription. Google AI Ultra for Business is available as an add-on to Google Workspace customers. Learn more: https://support.google.com/a/answer/16345165

The Google Gemini mobile app is available in selected languages and countries. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/iosrequirements

Gemini Live feature availability varies based on language. Learn more:
g.co/gemini/ioslanguages

While Gemini can help you with many tasks like checking the weather, giving directions, and finding and summarising information across the web and apps, Gemini does not yet support device actions like setting an alarm, sending a text message and others on iOS.

Review the Gemini Apps Privacy Notice:
g.co/gemini/privacynotice

Clean up your iPhone and optimize storage in seconds. 

Remove duplicate photos, videos, and junk emails. Cleanup helps you clear your camera roll, merge duplicate contacts, compress videos, and organize storage — all in one app.

OPTIMIZE STORAGE – FREE UP SPACE WITH ONE TAP
Running low on space? Cleanup gives you powerful tools to take control:
- Delete duplicate photos and videos
- Remove similar screenshots and lookalike videos
- Compress large files without losing quality
- Clean up spam and promotional emails
- Delete unused contacts and tidy up your address book
- Free up storage instantly with one tap.

CLEAN YOUR GALLERY FAST - DELETE DUPLICATE PHOTOS
No more manual browsing. Cleanup makes it easy:
- Instantly detect and delete duplicate photos
- Smart grouping for similar photos, with “Best” marked
- Remove large, lookalike videos
- Identify and delete screenshots in bulk

EMAIL CLEANER - DECLUTTER YOUR INBOX
Declutter your inbox in seconds:
- Highlight and remove promo, spam, and unread emails
- Clear out junk with one tap

CONTACTS CLEANUP
Keep your contacts organized and up to date:
- Merge duplicates
- Remove incomplete or unused entries
- View and edit from one place

COMPRESS VIDEOS  - SAVE SPACE, KEEP QUALITY
Save storage without deleting memories:
- Compress large files with minimal quality loss
- Select exactly which videos to compress

CHARGING ANIMATIONS
Turn charging into a personal moment with vivid, customizable animations.

SECRET SPACE – HIDE WHAT’S PERSONAL
Hide personal content in a secure, PIN-protected vault only you can access.

WIDGETS
Add instant cleanup tools to your Home and Lock Screens:
- Battery and storage widgets
- Tap to launch cleanup features quickly

REVIEW BEFORE YOU DELETE
Nothing is removed without your approval.  After each cleaning session, you get a final review screen to double-check your selections.
 No accidental deletions, no surprises — you're always in control.

OFFLINE AND PRIVATE
Your data stays private:
- No internet connection needed
- No files leave your phone
- No tracking or data misuse

Your privacy is fully protected — even we can’t access your photos.





Payment & Subscription Terms:


Choose between the following subscription options for unlimited access to all features:


• Weekly Subscription
• Lifetime Subscription


FREE TRIAL FOR 7 DAYS - OFFERING UNLIMITED GALLERY CLEANING FOR A LIMITED TIME


***You may cancel your subscription at any time***


Cleanup’s free trial allows you unlimited access to all features for the duration of 7 days. Your account will be automatically charged for renewal, based on the annual subscription plan, within 24 hours before the end of the 7 days free trial period.


You can cancel auto-renewal at any time, given that the cancellation is at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when making a purchase of an auto-renewing subscription.


***Manage your subscription directly from your iPhone***
Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned off by going to the Account Settings:
- Open the Settings app.
- Tap your name.
- Tap Subscriptions.
- Tap the subscription that you want to manage.




Privacy policy: https://cleanup.photos/privacy
Terms of use: https://cleanup.photos/terms

With PPL you have all your shipments and rewards in your pocket! Thanks to mojePPL app, which keeps an honest eye on them – day and night. With just a few finger taps, you know everything you need to know. Send, return and pick up parcels whenever and wherever it suits you, collect points and choose your reward. Download mojePPL app and keep your shipments close at hand.   


Loyalty pays  

Do you want to send shipments at a discount or for 1 CZK? Thanks to our loyalty programme, you can - get to know a novelty on the Czech logistics market. Just choose a transport with PPL and the rewards will just pour in. Collect points, complete challenges and advance to the next level.    


Send a shipment conveniently – from 76 CZK  

Need to send a shipment? Our app makes it easy - just in four steps. The app guides you through the entire process from the beginning to payment and dispatch.  


Track your shipment  

24 hours a day, 7 days a week - your shipments are always under control. mojePPL app gives you a perfect overview of everything related to your shipment: sender and recipient information, shipment status, delivery location, PIN code for pick up and much more.  


Stay in the loop 

What's new with your shipment, and what's new in PPL? Turn on notifications and you won't miss anything.   


Find your pick-up point  

Looking for the nearest PPL Parcelbox or PPL Parcelshop? Thanks to the interactive map, you can see all our dispatch and pick-up points, filter and view detailed information about them.   


Measure your shipment  

Not sure what size your shipment is? Our special shipment measurement feature helps you. In just a few steps you can easily find out the size of your shipment using the camera.  

It has never been easier! You'll find everything you need in myPPL, and you can also easily reroute, return or archive your shipment.

The new My Vodafone+ app is here! It brings a fresh design, a clearer interface, intuitive navigation, and much faster performance. In short: an app that’s always with you.

• Stay in control of your account anytime, anywhere. View your data usage, calls, SMS, and Bills. All in one place.

• Manage services and payments with ease. Add or adjust services, top up credit, or pay Bills – all at your fingertips.

• Introducing Vodafone Happy – our new loyalty program designed to make you happy. Enjoy special offers from our partners, Vodafone’s promotions and events, with even more features on the way.

• Meet the improved chatbot TOBi – it helps to easily solve your requests. So talk to him.

• Sleek new design with powerful features – dark mode, SIM activation, connection speed tests, store locator, coverage maps, and more — all packed in a new beautiful design.

Do you have any suggestions? We’d love to hear from you! We appreciate your feedback, it helps us improve our services. We hope you will love the new app!

Introducing ChatGPT for iOS: OpenAI’s latest advancements at your fingertips.

This official app is free, syncs your history across devices, and brings you the latest from OpenAI, including the new image generator.

With ChatGPT in your pocket, you’ll find:

· Image generation–Generate original images from a description, or transform existing ones with a few simple words. 
· Advanced Voice Mode–Tap the soundwave icon to have a real-time convo on the go. Settle a dinner table debate, or practice a new language. 
· Photo upload—Snap or upload a picture to transcribe a handwritten recipe or get info about a landmark. 
· Creative inspiration—Find custom birthday gift ideas or create a personalized greeting card.
· Tailored advice—Talk through a tough situation, ask for a detailed travel itinerary, or get help crafting the perfect response. 
· Personalized learning—Explain electricity to a dinosaur-loving kid or easily brush up yourself on a historic event.
· Professional input—Brainstorm marketing copy or map out a business plan.
· Instant answers—Get recipe suggestions when you only have a few ingredients.

Join hundreds of millions of users and try the app captivating the world. Download ChatGPT today.

Terms of service & privacy policy:
https://openai.com/policies/terms-of-use
https://openai.com/policies/privacy-policy

Find your favourite products from perfume, make-up and skincare to lifestyle. Shop popular cosmetics brands such as Benefit, Urban Decay and Kylie Cosmetics and scroll through our online perfumery to find high-quality fragrances from Chanel to Dior. You'll also find trendy skincare brands such as The Ordinary and Rituals - for a radiant complexion and your wellness break. Pamper your hair with exclusive care highlights from KÉRASTASE and Redken. Fall in love with new products and trends such as K-beauty, clean beauty and organic cosmetics every day with the Douglas app - the smallest make-up bag in the world is waiting for you!

Your exclusive benefits:

- DOUGLAS BEAUTY CARD: Collect valuable Douglas Beauty Points with every purchase in the app or in our shops.

- DOUGLAS BEAUTY MIRROR: Test make-up looks with a mirror of a special kind! Discover lipsticks, foundations, mascaras & co. that set you off perfectly. Our augmented reality tool acts like a filter over your face and shows you currently highlighted products and different styles. Wedding look, nude make-up or French chic? You decide!

- PURCHASE FUNCTION: Reorder your beauty and perfume favourites with just a few clicks. Have all your empties been replenished already? Then pause the repurchase or remove the product from the repurchase list. Turn the Douglas app into your personalised shopping list!

- LIVE SHOPPING EVENTS: Discover highlighted products and hot trends in our regular live streams. You can use the comment function to ask our experts your beauty questions.

- UP TO DATE ON ALL DEVICES: Add your new product faves to your wishlist or directly to the shopping cart - we automatically synchronise your selection on all devices you're logged in to.

- FAST ACCOUNT OVERVIEW: Look at your current orders, personal data and delivery addresses at a glance.

- FIND YOUR FAVOURITE STORE: Use our store finder to discover the Douglas stores near you.

- NEWS AND OFFERS AT A GLANCE: Activate the push notifications and be the first to know about the latest Douglas discounts.

- BEAUTY TIPS & TRENDS: Get inspired by our online magazine and discover the hottest beauty trends!

Notino: The whole beauty world in your pocket, anywhere, anytime!

Notino is the largest European online store selling cosmetics and perfumes. We have almost everything in stock from more than 1,500 global brands. Plus offers tailored to suit your tastes, authentic reviews and lots of smart tools to help you choose the right foundation, lipstick or perfume.

Fall in love with Notino today

⁕  App-only offers
Direct access to the best prices, special offers created just for you and available only in the app. Be the first to know about all of our discounts and offers!

⁕ Wishlist
Keep all your beauty favourites in one place, create a shopping list or use Wishlist to hunt for a better deal!

⁕ Reviews
Are you afraid to purchase new beauty products without any personal experience? We've got loads of verified reviews from our customers at Notino to help you with your decision.

⁕ Virtual Try On
Try our Virtual Try On, which shows you how a given shade of lipstick, foundation or eyeshadow will look on you thanks to the selfie mode on your camera. It’s fun ;-)

⁕ Fast, simple and safe shopping
Search, choose, then pay and look forward to receiving your package, which is usually sent the same day!

And that’s not all… Notino will be your endless source of inspiration thanks to our professional blog or our regular live streams ;-)

See you in the Notino app!

Stuck at the same spots? No time to read reviews and spend ages finding where to eat? We make it easy! With TasteTown, you can discover hundreds of top venues nearby—simply and clearly. Plus, enjoy perks you’ll love:

- Exclusive discounts: Buy one, get one free; up to 50% off; or free drinks.

- No commitments: Try one DEAL free, no payment details needed.

- Membership: Unlimited discoveries with a monthly or annual subscription—the investment usually pays off after the first use.

- Invite friends: Get one month free for each friend!

So what are you waiting for? Download TasteTown and explore your city’s flavors with benefits!

Knowunity with SchoolGPT – the UK’s most popular learning app for students from Year 5 to A-Levels – is COMPLETELY FREE! Over 22 million students across Europe use Knowunity to boost their grades – that’s every other student in the UK! 

► Better grades thanks to Knowunity: 94% of our users say so.
► “You get everything you need for school here, and the AI features are incredible. You won’t want to use any other AI app!”
► “I learn better, faster, and more easily. Thank you for creating this life-saving school app!”

WHY CHOOSE KNOWUNITY (SCHOOLGPT)? THE BEST AI FOR STUDENTS
> AI that truly understands school life
> Tailored explanations for every year group, right in the chat
> AI scanner, available 24/7, with the best answers
> Quizzes, revision notes, mock exams, or visual explanations – all created for you in the AI chat
> 100% personalised and completely free

FREE REVISION MATERIALS
> Access millions of revision notes and learning resources from other students
> Flashcards, summaries, mock exams, practice tests and much more
> Get a better understanding of every topic
> Discover a wide range of content for each subject in your search results

STUDY YOUR WAY
> Flashcards for all topics
> Create automatic quizzes and flashcards
> Listen to all content
> Mock exams for every subject

SCHOOL PLANNER
> Your library: all your study materials in one app
> Download content for offline use

HOMEWORK HELP
> Scan maths questions
> Essay writing support

STUDENT COMMUNITY
> A community of students
> Student chats for every topic
> Exchange ideas and stay motivated together
> Create study groups and build your own learning community!

SHARE YOUR KNOWLEDGE
> Create your profile
> Share your content and inspire others
> Help students learn and understand – become a creator

AI FEATURES FOR SCHOOL
> AI Scanner
> AI Helper
> AI Chat
> AI Tutor
> Knowunity SchoolGPT is perfect for ALL STUDENTS, ALL YEAR GROUPS, and ALL SUBJECTS. It’s fun and completely free.

SCHOOL. MADE SIMPLE.
Knowunity is designed with students’ needs in mind, so you’ll find everything you need for school in one app. Discover only relevant content, learn with friends, and find motivation and inspiration. The tutor and student community are always there for you, so you’ll never have to study alone again.
Find high-quality revision materials created by students, covering every part of the curriculum – with no gaps!

We’re real people, and we value your feedback. If you have questions or suggestions, please contact us at 
support-uk@knowunity.com
.
For more information, visit 
WWW.KNOWUNITY.CO.UK

Terms & Conditions: 
https://knowunity.co.uk/terms

Nová aplikace CREDITAS One spojuje do jednoho moderního a bezpečného mobilního bankovnictví vše, co chcete.

CREDITAS One je nová mobilní aplikace, která spojuje všechny vaše oblíbené bankovní služby do jednoho moderního a bezpečného prostředí. Přinášíme rychlou, přehlednou a spolehlivou aplikaci dostupnou 24/7.

 Co v aplikaci najdete?
 •  Přehled všech produktů na jednom místě
Sledujte a spravujte své produkty, včetně disponentských, přehledně v jedné aplikaci.

 •  Okamžité upozornění na pohyby na účtu a kartách
Získejte přehled o všech transakcích díky notifikacím v reálném čase.

 •  Rychlé platby a platby přes QR kód
Plaťte pohodlně – podporujeme okamžité platby i platby pomocí QR kódu. V aplikaci zadáte také trvalé příkazy, inkasa, SIPO a SEPA platby.

 •  Jednoduchá správa karet
Mějte karty pod kontrolou: nastavujte limity, požádejte si o novou nebo zablokujte stávající kartu.

 •  Možnosti spoření 
Založte si spořicí účet nebo termínovaný vklad a zhodnocujte své peníze přímo z aplikace.

 •  Zakládání nových produktů online
Nový účet nebo jiný produkt založíte snadno na pár kliknutí.

 •  Výpisy a šablony pohromadě
Vše potřebné máte vždy po ruce – bezpečně uložené a kdykoliv dostupné.

Kontakt s bankou
•  Z aplikace můžete kdykoli jednoduše poslat zprávu bance. 
 
Bezpečnost je pro nás prioritou
Pro přihlášení do aplikace i potvrzení jakékoliv akce je potřeba zadat MPIN nebo použít biometrické ověření (otisk prstem, odemykání obličejem). V případě potřeby lze aplikaci deaktivovat přes internetové bankovnictví.
 
Objevte všechny funkce a stáhněte si CREDITAS One.

myDPD app offers a wide range of functions.

● Retrieve automatically all your parcels: register and you will be able to check on the current status of all your parcels instantly.

● Access to the informations of your parcels, on their way to you, track your parcel live and know down to the hour when your parcel will arrive at your doorstep

● Redirect your parcel: you decide when and where we deliver your shipment. If you aren't at home, you can choose to change delivery day or choose to collect from a Pickup parcelshop. 

● Easily find the perfect parcelshop, using your location and filtering with the most relevant criteria (opening hours, parking...)

The end of the desperate searches on the Internet. You can get almost anything on Alza. Everything conveniently in one place, right in your pocket.

- Wide range of thousands of unique items (50 000+)
- Reviews, quality descriptions, photos and customer reviews
- Goods grouped by brands and parameters
- Order history and status tracking
- One-touch quick purchase
- Special offers and price deals
- Fast and convenient product search including search history
- Shopping lists for repeated purchases
- Convenient controls on iPhone and iPad

Mobilní aplikace Balíkovna je váš „parťák“ pro balíkové služby. Díky ní můžete snadno a kdykoliv:

- odesílat balíky v rámci široké sítě Balíkoven a AlzaBoxů po celé ČR
- sledovat a vyzvedávat své příchozí balíky
- kontrolovat stav doručení odeslaných balíků
- vyhledávat informace o Balíkovnách a výdejních boxech

Aby vám mohla aplikace přinášet všechny potřebné informace k vašim balíkům a usnadňovala vám
vyplňování informací při odesílání, je potřeba se nejprve zaregistrovat a přihlásit ke svému účtu.
Nemusíte mít obavy, celá registrace je velmi jednoduchá a nezabere víc než 3 minuty.

Odesílání balíků na výdejní místo
Vyplníte údaje o balíku včetně případné dobírky. Díky interaktivní mapě vyberete preferovanou
Balíkovnu nebo box. Zaplatíte kartou nebo přes Apple Pay. S kódem pro podání balík odnesete na
jakoukoli Balíkovnu. Balík můžete podat i na AlzaBoxu, ale nesmíte zapomenout na něj nalepit
adresní štítek, který stáhnete přímo z aplikace, nebo vám ho pošleme e-mailem.

Odesílání balíků na adresu
Vyplníte údaje o balíku včetně případné dobírky. Našeptávač vám pomůže nalézt správnou adresu.
Zaplatíte kartou nebo přes Apple Pay. Odeslat balík můžete na Balíkovně i v AlzaBoxu, ale
nezapomeňte na něj nalepit adresní štítek, který stáhnete přímo z aplikace nebo vašeho e-mailu.
Pokud odesíláte balík na dobírku, vybranou částku vám na účet zašleme do 3 dnů.

Sledování balíků
Aplikace vás bude aktivně informovat, jakmile vám někdo pošle balík. Cestu svého balíku můžete
sledovat a v aplikaci najdete všechny informace potřebné k přijetí nebo vyzvednutí balíku.

Přehled zásilek
Všechny balíky máte přehledně na jednom místě. Rozdělené podle toho, jestli jste odesílatel nebo
adresát. Po prokliku na detail balíku se dozvíte veškeré potřebné informace.

Vyhledávání Balíkoven
Zajímá vás otevírací doba některé z Balíkoven nebo třeba potřebujete zjistit nejkratší cestu
k některému z výdejních boxů? V aplikaci vyhledáte všechny pobočky i s mapovým zobrazením.

Try Between us service! The easiest way how to send a parcel to another person in Czech, Slovak, Hungary and Romania. You can use our pick-up points or home delivery service. 
It's fast, without queues and long waits. No more paperwork, long forms or printing labels. All of that from 3,40 €.


What's in the app?

Send a shipment - Between us
No more paperwork, forms or printing labels. With our mobile application, in which you can find the Between us service, you can send a shipment in a moment. All you need is a phone and an online payment. You can pay online with card or via Apple Pay.

Returning the shipment
Do you need to return a shipment to the e-shop? No problem. The application enables a simple return of the shipment, you only need to enter the code that you received from the e-shop. You don't need to fill in anything else.

Tracking
Thanks to the detailed tracking of the shipment and the connection with our system, you will know exactly where the shipment is located.

Push Notifications
Be informed. The app will notify you immediately when the shipment is ready for pickup.

Delivery points
Thanks to the interactive map, you can search for the nearest delivery points in the area. At the same time, the built-in filter allows you to select those places where you can pay by card, for example. You will then find a description of how to get there, including photos or opening hours, in the details of the delivery point.

Shipment archive
In the shipment archive, you can view all your shipments that have ever been paired with your account.

The fall season for shopping is here! With Allegro, you can catch the best deals and prepare for any weather. Discover thousands of products and enjoy convenient shopping, wherever you are. Get your wardrobe ready for cooler days, find ideal items for home and garden, and equip yourself with the latest electronics.

On Allegro, you will find everything you need:
Clothes for fall: Warm sweaters, stylish coats, comfortable ankle boots
Electronics: New smartphones, laptops, TV sets, drones, gaming equipment, and smartwatches
Home and Garden: Style your home for fall, prepare your garden for winter, find furniture, lighting, and decorations
Hobby: Books for long evenings, board games, sports accessories, and art supplies.
Beauty: Cosmetics for skin care and make-up, perfume, hair accessories.

Shopping in the palm of your hand:
- Easy shopping, fast payments: Buy conveniently, pay with Apple Pay, BLIK, card, or a different method of your choice
- Comfort at any time: Do you like browsing offers in the evening? Switch to dark mode and shop comfortably without straining your eyes
- Tried-and-tested products, trusted sellers: See reviews from other buyers to make sure that you choose what is best. You can easily add your own review, too!
- The list fo your Favorites: Add products to favorites to revisit them later, and share interesting offers with your friends
- Delivery tracking: With widgets, you can quickly see the status of your shipment
- Quick search: Do you search with images? Or perhaps you scan barcodes? With Image Search and Price Scanner, you will find products immediately
- Virtual wallet: Store loyalty cards from your favorite places
- Air quality: Check the air quality in your area thanks to sensors mounted on Allegro One Box machines
- Millions of products, plenty of inspiration: Choose among millions of products from different categories

Discover new functions in the Allegro app appreciated by millions of users that launched on the market more than 10 years ago.

Would you like to have free deliveries and returns?
In the app, you can also use Allegro Smart! and save on deliveries. Just pay once and enjoy free deliveries for an entire year or month.

Allegro Smart! offers great advantages:
- unlimited free deliveries with purchases over 45 PLN to parcel lockers and pick-up points and over 65 PLN by courier - free returns of shipments via parcel lockers and pick-up points,
- access to Smart! Deals — products at lower prices only for Allegro Smart! members,
- priority processing of Allegro Buyer Protection requests

All offers available with Smart! delivery have a special Smart! badge. You can find the details in the service Terms & Conditions.

Allegro App is:

- the greatest selection — over 250 million offers from various categories, like Kids (e.g., Toys, Educational Games, Clothing, Shoes, Strollers, School Supplies — Calculators, Notepads, Study Aids), Games, Home and Garden (e.g., Tools, Lighting, Smart Home, Garden Furniture), Electronics (e.g., Photography, Smartphones and Cell Phones, Smartwatches, Tablets, Computers, Audio, Video and Household Appliances, Consoles and Gaming Machines), Automotive (including Cars, Car Care Products, Tires and Rims, Garage Tools and Equipment), Health (including Blood Pressure Monitors and Accessories, Thermometers, Alternative Medicine, Medicine Cabinet Essentials, Humidifiers, Air Purifiers), Supermarket (e.g., Groceries, Healthy Foods), Fashion (including Clothing, Shoes, Accessories, Jewelry and Watches), Culture and Entertainment (e.g., Movies, Musical Instruments, Coupons and Top-Ups, Music, Games), Sports and Travel (e.g., Bicycles and Accessories, Running Clothes and "Running Shoes, Gym Accessories), as well as concert tickets and many more

Say more with Threads — Instagram’s text-based conversation app.

Threads is where communities come together to discuss everything from the topics you care about today to what’ll be trending tomorrow. Whatever it is you’re interested in, you can follow and connect directly with your favorite creators and others who love the same things — or build a loyal following of your own to share your ideas, opinions and creativity with the world!

A few things you can do on Threads…

■ Access your Instagram followers
Your Instagram username and verification badge are reserved for you. Automatically follow the same accounts you follow on Instagram in a few taps, and discover new accounts too.

■ Share your point of view
Spin up a new thread to express what's on your mind. This is your space to be yourself, and you control who can reply.

■ Connect with friends and your favorite creators
Jump to the replies to get in on the action and react to commentary, humor and insight from the creators you know and love. Find your community and connect with people who care about whatever it is you’re interested in.

■ Control the conversation
Customize your settings and use controls to manage who can see your content, reply to your threads, or mention you. Accounts you’ve blocked will carry over from Instagram, and we’re enforcing the same Community Guidelines to help ensure everyone interacts safely and authentically. 

■ Find ideas and inspiration
From TV recommendations to career advice, get answers to your questions or learn something new from crowd-sourced conversations, thought leaders and industry experts.

■ Never miss a moment
Stay on top of the latest trends and live events. Whether it’s about new music, movie premieres, sports, games, TV shows, fashion, or the latest product releases, find discussions and receive notifications any time your favorite profiles start a new thread.

■ Leap into the fediverse
Threads is part of the fediverse, a global, open, social network of independent servers operated by third parties around the world. Servers share information with each other to enable people to connect and discover new things across the fediverse.


Meta Terms: https://www.facebook.com/terms.php
Meta Privacy Policy: https://privacycenter.instagram.com/policy
Threads Supplemental Privacy Policy: https://help.instagram.com/515230437301944
Threads Supplemental Terms: https://help.instagram.com/769983657850450
Instagram Community Guidelines: https://help.instagram.com/477434105621119
Consumer Health Privacy Policy: https://privacycenter.instagram.com/policies/health

Learn how we're working to help keep our communities safe across Meta technologies at the Meta Safety Center: https://about.meta.com/actions/safety

developer: General Logistics Systems Czech Republic s.r.o.
description:
Mějte své balíky pod kontrolou
Používáte různé e-mailové adresy v různých online obchodech? Stačí přidat e-mailové adresy, které používáte při online nákupech, a vaše zásilky GLS se automaticky zobrazí v aplikaci.

Obdržíte oznámení o umístění vaší zásilky.
Budeme vás informovat o všech důležitých detailech.
Můžete zkontrolovat stav svých zásilek a očekávaný čas příjezdu.
Uvidíte všechny důležité údaje o svých zásilkách (odesílatel, dodací adresa, stav platby, číslo zásilky).
Snadno můžete změnit dodací adresu a datum doručení.

Snadno si vyzvedněte svou zásilku z oblíbeného GLS Parcel Boxu nebo Parcel Shopu.
Jste během dne zaneprázdněni a raději byste zvolili výdejní místa GLS místo doručení domů? Žádný problém, nahlédněte do mapy s tisíci GLS výdejními místy. Jakmile bude vaše zásilka k vyzvednutí na požadovaném výdejním místě, odešleme vám oznámení. PIN kód pro vyzvednutí můžete získat jedním klepnutím v aplikaci. V případě potřeby můžete tento kód zkopírovat a sdílet se svými přáteli a rodinou.

Nastavte si adresy a GLS výdejní místa svým požadavkům
Nastavte si oblíbená GLS výdejní místa a uložte různé adresy pro snadné přesměrování zásilek.

Seznam vašich zásilek
Sledujte předchozí doručené zásilky spolu s jejich podrobnými údaji.

Kontaktujte nás
V pracovní dny (Pondělí - Pátek): 7:00 - 18:00
Zákaznický servis: +420 567 771 111
Napište nám: info@gls-czech.com

Shop brands you love:

- Shop big brands and local stores, and follow your faves
- Get notified about special offers, price drops, restocks, and new product drops
- Save items for later and organize things into collections (like “camping gear” or “ideas for dad”)
- Just so you know: brands don’t pay extra to sell on Shop, which means each time you buy, you’re helping out the business

Check out with one tap:

- Your payment info, shipping address, and shopping preferences all live in your secure Shop Pay wallet
- Just tap to check out (no more getting up to go find your card)
- Every shopping cart from every store is saved on Shop, so it’s all there when you’re ready to check out
- Just so you know: your info is safe with Shop, which meets strict PCI compliance standards

Track all your orders:

- See every order from every store you buy from
- Map exactly where each package is now
- Shop can even scan your email for new order info and collect it for you in the app (no more searching your inbox for updates) 

- - -

Have a question or just want to say hello? Contact us by visiting help.shop.app

Shop secure and worry free: Our servers meet strict PCI compliance standards for vaulting credit card info.

Powered by Shopify: Shop was created by the commerce platform trusted by millions of businesses worldwide.

Znajdź swoje happy place! Przeglądaj most wanted ubrania oraz akcesoria łatwo i szybko, bo za pomocą intuicyjnych filtrów wyszukiwania. Poluj na nowości, promocje i akcje specjalne, twórz własne wish-listy i oprócz tego...

- Zaglądaj do swojego koszyka — za sprawą apki, możesz otworzyć go na każdym urządzeniu. 

- Sprawdź dostępność danego produktu w sklepie online oraz w salonach stacjonarnych House. Znajdź też najbliższy sklep House w Twojej okolicy za pośrednictwem łatwej w obsłudze wyszukiwarki. 

- Interesuje Cię wyłącznie moda online? Zamów i skorzystaj z darmowej dostawy do salonów lub na wybrany adres przy zakupach za min. 140 PLN. 

- Miej wszystko pod kontrolą — apka House to także historia Twoich zamówień zebrana w jednym miejscu. Szczegóły dotyczące danego zakupu znajdziesz w intuicyjnym panelu klienta. 

- Za Tobą udane zakupy online? Pochwal się przed znajomymi tym, jakie ubrania i dodatki udało Ci się upolować! Z House możesz to zrobić za pośrednictwem mediów społecznościowych, bezpośrednio z poziomu aplikacji. 

Aplikacja House to przede wszystkim łatwe zakupy online, ale też miejsce, gdzie czeka na Ciebie mnóstwo inspiracji — w tym te pochodzące od Twoich ulubionych influencerów. Znajdziesz tutaj ubrania i akcesoria w różnych estetykach, bo moda jest tym, co wyrażać ma właśnie Ciebie! 

Nie zwlekaj, pobierz apkę House i GET INTO FASHION — niech wygodne i szybkie zakupy staną się częścią Twojej rutyny, a moda zamieszka w Twoim telefonie na stałe!

SIMPLE TO USE
Track all your services in one user-friendly app. You can easily order and manage individual services.

PLANS
Choose a plan that fits your lifestyle. A plan is a set of products and services for everyday banking, which includes an account, a card, payments, and ATM withdrawals.


MULTICURRENCY ACCOUNT
Use multiple currencies in one account. You can exchange money within your account in a few seconds and simply pay in the local currency abroad, wherever you go.


CHOOSE YOUR OWN ACCOUNT NUMBER AND NAME IT
Set your own account number, for example, your birthday or wedding anniversary. You can name the account whatever you like.


SAVINGS ACCOUNT AND ENVELOPES
Open a savings account online and have up to 10 savings envelopes. Organize your money into envelopes for whatever you need.


CARD ORDERING AND MANAGEMENT
In KB+ you can order, unlock, and lock a card or view the PIN. Choose one of the designs offered and add your card to Apple Pay.


KB KLÍČ IS NOW PART OF KB+
You no longer need 2 apps to verify payments and logins. Now you can do everything in the KB+ app.


DRAG AND DROP PAYMENTS
Move money quickly and easily between your accounts and savings envelopes with a simple drag and drop.


TOUCH ID AND FACE ID
Make app login and payment verification easier with Touch ID or Face ID. Just use your finger or scan your face.


3D TOUCH
Long press the KB+ app icon on your mobile to choose from the most used features.


SPOTLIGHT
Explore the ability to search KB+ app features through Spotlight.


BUILDING SAVINGS
Get state support of up to 2,000 CZK per year and enrich your savings with a guaranteed interest rate for 6 years.


EXTRA SERVICE CESTOVÁNÍ
Insure yourself against unexpected events on the road. With the extra service Cestování, you won't be caught off guard by a traffic accident, lost luggage, or a trip cancellation. The service is valid all year round.


SUPPLEMENTARY PENSION SAVINGS
Save and invest for retirement. In KB+, you can now arrange a pension not only for yourself, but for your child too. In addition, your child can collect a third of their own contributions from the age of 18.


CHILDREN'S SAVINGS ACCOUNT
Save for your child with a great interest rate. You can open an account via the application. Additionally, your child can manage their own account from the age of 6, and from 15, they can open an account on their own.


PLAN FOR ENTREPRENEURS
Open and manage your business account in the app. Share access to it with managers or your accountant. With higher-level plans, you also get a multicurrency account for free.

Usnadněte si nákupy v BILLE díky nové přehledné aplikaci. Kromě užitečných funkcí, jako například vyhledání nejbližší prodejny ve vašem okolí, navigace do vybrané prodejny a vlastního nákupního seznamu, vám aplikace nabízí k nahlédnutí také aktuální leták. Nově se prostřednictvím aplikace můžete zaregistrovat do věrnostního programu BILLA Bonus club a získat tak přístup ke své digitální kartě. Dále jsme aplikaci rozšířili o slevové kupony na slevy u našich exkluzivních partnerů a přidali jsme inspiraci v podobě receptů z našeho food blogu Gusto Academy.

				FUNKCE APLIKACE BILLA
				* Registrace online do BILLA Bonus clubu
				* Digitální karta BILLA Bonus clubu
				* Slevové kupony na slevy u našich exkluzivních partnerů
				* Možnost objednat si plastovou BILLA kartu
				* Zobrazení aktuální stavu bodového konta
				* Inspiraci v podobě receptů z blogu Gusto Academy
				* Vyhledání nejbližší prodejny BILLA
				* Výpočet trasy a navigace do vybrané prodejny
				* Aktuální leták
				* Nákupní seznam
				* Kontaktní informace

Make getting around easier with Bolt! Whether you need a ride across town, an airport transfer, or a scooter to zip through traffic, our app makes it easy to move around confidently and conveniently.

WHY CHOOSE BOLT?
- Request a ride in seconds: enjoy safe, affordable rides with top-rated drivers.
- Transparent pricing: see your fare upfront so there are no surprises.
- Multiple payment options: pay securely using a credit/debit card, Apple Pay, Google Pay, or cash.

EASY ORDERING:
- Open the app and set your destination.
- Choose from various ride types to suit your needs (Comfort, Premium, Electric, XL, and more).
- Track your driver in real time.
- Arrive in comfort and rate your experience.

SAFETY FIRST:
Some of Bolt’s safety features require the app to run in the background.

- Emergency assist button: discreetly alert our Safety Team in case of emergencies.
- Audio trip recording: record audio during rides for added peace of mind.
- Private phone details: your contact information stays confidential when you call a driver.

PLAN AHEAD:
Need an airport transfer or an early morning ride? You can schedule your trip in advance from 30 minutes to 90 days before your expected pickup time.

*JOIN BOLT PLUS TO UNLOCK PREMIUM FEATURES!
Get the best of Bolt with Bolt Plus. Enjoy exclusive perks that save you time and money, making every ride smoother and more convenient.

*BOLT DRIVE:
We're committed to our carbon net zero goal by 2040. That's why we're increasing the lineup of electric and hybrid cars in Bolt Drive, our car-sharing service. You can also rent Bolt scooters and e-bikes via the app.

*DELIVER PACKAGES
Use the 'Send' ride type to arrange fast and convenient parcel delivery in your city.

Bolt is available in 50 countries and 600+ cities worldwide (see the full list at https://bolt.eu/en/cities/). We rebranded from Taxify to Bolt in 2019.

Bolt is the perfect taxi alternative for fast, reliable, and affordable rides. The app provides a seamless ride-ordering experience whether you’re commuting, travelling, or running errands. So, the next time you need a ride, choose Bolt!

*Bolt options differ by location. Check the app for availability in your city.

Earn money driving with the Bolt Driver app. Sign up: https://bolt.eu/driver/

Questions? Get in touch via info@bolt.eu or at https://bolt.eu

Follow us on social media for updates, discounts, and offers!

Facebook — https://www.facebook.com/Bolt/
Instagram — https://www.instagram.com/bolt
X — https://x.com/Boltapp

Ušetřete vždy nejvíc a za zdravé jídlo ještě víc s aplikací Můj Albert a přidejte se k více než 3 milionům spokojených uživatelů. 
 
Díky exkluzivním akcím pouze s aplikací získáte oblíbené produkty za ještě lepší ceny. Vedle toho vás nákupy vybraných produktů odměníme kredity a až budete chtít, jednoduše je vyměníte za slevu na cokoliv. 
 
Hledáte inspiraci pro vaření? Tisíce oblíbených receptů z našeho Albert Magazínu máte vždy po ruce a to doslova na klik. 
 
K tomu všemu získáte nejrychlejší přístup k aktuálnímu letáku a všem svým účtenkám v přehledné elektronické podobě. A navíc šetříte přírodu. 
Více informací na www.albert.cz/aplikace.
